author: 1CanadianGirl
title: Enjoyable stay at Springhill Suites -
text: This Springhill Suites is in a great location in mid-town close to shopping, restaurants and the subway. Good and ample breakfast served. The front desk staff were always pleasant and helpful. We got a room with a wonderful view of the Empire State Building. I would stay here again.
